data.prayer: Father, give the disciples of the the state of Boyacá an urgency of seeing every people and place reached for the gospel.
data.verse: As long as it is day, we must do the works of him who sent me. Night is coming, when no one can work.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Boyacá, Colombia
data.section_summary: What challenges do people here face?

data.prayer: Jesus, you are the great high priest, please make the 133,359 believers in Boyacá, Colombia a worthy priesthood under you.
data.verse: Since then we have a great high priest who has passed through the heavens, Jesus, the Son of God, let us hold fast our confession.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 9 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Father, please help good, online teachers get the gospel on YouTube and into the the state of Boyacá.
data.verse: And this gospel of the kingdom will be preached in the whole world as a testimony to all nations, and then the end will come.

data.prayer: Spirit, awaken a burning desire for your presence and intimacy among the 1,242,700 people living in the state of Boyacá.
Jesus, teach the believers in the state of Boyacá that love for you and obedience to you are connected.
data.verse: If you love me, keep my commands.

data.prayer: Jesus, please give your people in Boyacá, Colombia a passion for the lost.
data.verse: We are therefore Christ’s ambassadors, as though God were making his appeal through us. We implore you on Christ’s behalf: Be reconciled to God.

data.prayer: Father, may the churches in Boyacá, Colombia honor local leaders who work hard for the flock of God.
data.verse: Pay careful attention to yourselves and to all the flock, in which the Holy Spirit has made you overseers, to care for the church of God, which he obtained with his own blood.
